Articles.Content:
Hi

I've previously modded the "rockomax brand adapter" so it had some RCS/fuel in it.

I'm struggling to find it in the new folder set up. Which folder and name does it come under in >2.0.

Thanks

Best bet to find something like that is to use a multiple text file search like that one

And for your answer: GameData\Squad\Parts\Utility\largeAdapter
